trans-unit.source: To download hotfixes
trans-unit.target: To download hotfixes

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to download the software update from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to download the software update from the Microsoft Update Catalog.

trans-unit.source: Start Internet Explorer and navigate to [http://catalog.update.microsoft.com](http://catalog.update.microsoft.com).
trans-unit.target: Start Internet Explorer and navigate to [http://catalog.update.microsoft.com](http://catalog.update.microsoft.com).

trans-unit.source: If this is your first time using the Microsoft Update Catalog on this computer, click **Install** when prompted to install the Microsoft Update Catalog add-on.
trans-unit.target: If this is your first time using the Microsoft Update Catalog on this computer, click **Install** when prompted to install the Microsoft Update Catalog add-on.

trans-unit.source: ![Install catalog](./media/storsimple-install-update2-hotfix/HCS_InstallCatalog-include.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Install catalog](./media/storsimple-install-update2-hotfix/HCS_InstallCatalog-include.png)

trans-unit.source: In the search box of the Microsoft Update Catalog, enter the Knowledge Base (KB) number of the hotfix you want to download, for example **3121901**, and then click **Search**.
trans-unit.target: In the search box of the Microsoft Update Catalog, enter the Knowledge Base (KB) number of the hotfix you want to download, for example **3121901**, and then click **Search**.

trans-unit.source: The hotfix listing appears, for example, **Cumulative Software Bundle Update 2.0 for StorSimple 8000 Series**.
trans-unit.target: The hotfix listing appears, for example, **Cumulative Software Bundle Update 2.0 for StorSimple 8000 Series**.

trans-unit.source: Search catalog
trans-unit.target: Search catalog

trans-unit.source: Click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: The update is added to the basket.
trans-unit.target: The update is added to the basket.

trans-unit.source: Search for any additional hotfixes listed in the table above (**3121900**, **3080728**, **3090322**, and **3121899**), and add each the basket.
trans-unit.target: Search for any additional hotfixes listed in the table above (**3121900**, **3080728**, **3090322**, and **3121899**), and add each the basket.

trans-unit.source: Click **View Basket**.
trans-unit.target: Click **View Basket**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Download**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Download**.

trans-unit.source: Specify or **Browse** to a local location where you want the downloads to appear.
trans-unit.target: Specify or **Browse** to a local location where you want the downloads to appear.

trans-unit.source: The updates are downloaded to the specified location and placed in a subfolder with the same name as the update.
trans-unit.target: The updates are downloaded to the specified location and placed in a subfolder with the same name as the update.

trans-unit.source: The folder can also be copied to a network share that is reachable from the device.
trans-unit.target: The folder can also be copied to a network share that is reachable from the device.

trans-unit.source: The hotfixes must be accessible from both controllers to detect any potential error messages from the peer controller.
trans-unit.target: The hotfixes must be accessible from both controllers to detect any potential error messages from the peer controller.

trans-unit.source: To install and verify regular mode hotfixes
trans-unit.target: To install and verify regular mode hotfixes

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to install and verify regular-mode hotfixes.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to install and verify regular-mode hotfixes.

trans-unit.source: If you already installed them using the Azure Portal, skip ahead to [install and verify maintenance mode hotfixes](#to-install-and-verify-maintenance-mode-hotfixes).
trans-unit.target: If you already installed them using the Azure Portal, skip ahead to [install and verify maintenance mode hotfixes](#to-install-and-verify-maintenance-mode-hotfixes).

trans-unit.source: To install the hotfixes, access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.
trans-unit.target: To install the hotfixes, access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.

trans-unit.source: Follow the detailed instructions in [Use PuTTy to connect to the serial console](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console).
trans-unit.target: Follow the detailed instructions in [Use PuTTy to connect to the serial console](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console).

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, press **Enter**.
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, press **Enter**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Option 1** to log on to the device with full access.
trans-unit.target: Select **Option 1** to log on to the device with full access.

trans-unit.source: To install the hotfix, at the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: To install the hotfix, at the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: Use IP rather than DNS in share path in the above command.
trans-unit.target: Use IP rather than DNS in share path in the above command.

trans-unit.source: The credential parameter is used only if you are accessing an authenticated share.
trans-unit.target: The credential parameter is used only if you are accessing an authenticated share.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use the credential parameter to access shares.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you use the credential parameter to access shares.

trans-unit.source: Even shares that are open to “everyone” are typically not open to unauthenticated users.
trans-unit.target: Even shares that are open to “everyone” are typically not open to unauthenticated users.

trans-unit.source: A sample output is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample output is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Type **Y** when prompted to confirm the hotfix installation.
trans-unit.target: Type **Y** when prompted to confirm the hotfix installation.

trans-unit.source: Monitor the update by using the `Get-HcsUpdateStatus` cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Monitor the update by using the `Get-HcsUpdateStatus` cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output shows the update in progress.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output shows the update in progress.

trans-unit.source: The `RunInprogress` will be `True` when the update is in progress.
trans-unit.target: The `RunInprogress` will be `True` when the update is in progress.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.

trans-unit.source: The `RunInProgress` will be `False` when the update has completed.
trans-unit.target: The `RunInProgress` will be `False` when the update has completed.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Occasionally, the cmdlet reports `False` when the update is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Occasionally, the cmdlet reports `False` when the update is still in progress.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the hotfix is complete, wait for a few minutes, rerun this command and verify that the `RunInProgress` is `False`.
trans-unit.target: To ensure that the hotfix is complete, wait for a few minutes, rerun this command and verify that the `RunInProgress` is `False`.

trans-unit.source: If it is, then the hotfix has completed.
trans-unit.target: If it is, then the hotfix has completed.

trans-unit.source: After the software update is complete, repeat steps 3-5 to install and monitor the SaaS agent and MDS agent .
trans-unit.target: After the software update is complete, repeat steps 3-5 to install and monitor the SaaS agent and MDS agent .

trans-unit.source: Ensure that `all-hcsmdssoftwareupdate_0b438ddf0d5b686aada2378b754fac8c7f2160e9.exe` is installed before `all-cismdsagentupdatebundle_f98e62f4d56c79e2a6644d027af7a2393a93827a.exe`.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that `all-hcsmdssoftwareupdate_0b438ddf0d5b686aada2378b754fac8c7f2160e9.exe` is installed before `all-cismdsagentupdatebundle_f98e62f4d56c79e2a6644d027af7a2393a93827a.exe`.

trans-unit.source: Verify the system software versions.
trans-unit.target: Verify the system software versions.

trans-unit.source: Type:
trans-unit.target: Type:

trans-unit.source: You should see the following versions:
trans-unit.target: You should see the following versions:

trans-unit.source: HcsSoftwareVersion: 6.3.9600.17673
trans-unit.target: HcsSoftwareVersion: 6.3.9600.17673

trans-unit.source: CisAgentVersion: 1.0.9150.0
trans-unit.target: CisAgentVersion: 1.0.9150.0

trans-unit.source: MdsAgentVersion: 30.0.4698.13
trans-unit.target: MdsAgentVersion: 30.0.4698.13

trans-unit.source: If the version numbers do not change after applying the update, it indicates that the hotfix has failed to apply.
trans-unit.target: If the version numbers do not change after applying the update, it indicates that the hotfix has failed to apply.

trans-unit.source: Should you see this, please contact [Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for further assistance.
trans-unit.target: Should you see this, please contact [Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for further assistance.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 3-5 to install the remaining regular-mode hotfixes.
trans-unit.target: Repeat steps 3-5 to install the remaining regular-mode hotfixes.

trans-unit.source: The LSI driver - KB3121900
trans-unit.target: The LSI driver - KB3121900

trans-unit.source: The Storport update - KB3080728
trans-unit.target: The Storport update - KB3080728

trans-unit.source: The Spaceport update - KB3090322
trans-unit.target: The Spaceport update - KB3090322

trans-unit.source: To install and verify maintenance mode hotfixes
trans-unit.target: To install and verify maintenance mode hotfixes

trans-unit.source: Use KB3121899 to install disk firmware updates.
trans-unit.target: Use KB3121899 to install disk firmware updates.

trans-unit.source: These are disruptive updates and take around 30 minutes to complete.
trans-unit.target: These are disruptive updates and take around 30 minutes to complete.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to install these in a planned maintenance window by connecting to the device serial console.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to install these in a planned maintenance window by connecting to the device serial console.

trans-unit.source: Note that if your disk firmware is already up-to-date, you won't need to install these updates.
trans-unit.target: Note that if your disk firmware is already up-to-date, you won't need to install these updates.

trans-unit.source: Run the `Get-HcsUpdateAvailability` cmdlet from the device serial console to check if updates are available and whether the updates are disruptive (maintenance mode) or non-disruptive (regular mode) updates.
trans-unit.target: Run the `Get-HcsUpdateAvailability` cmdlet from the device serial console to check if updates are available and whether the updates are disruptive (maintenance mode) or non-disruptive (regular mode) updates.

trans-unit.source: To install the disk firmware updates, follow the instructions below.
trans-unit.target: To install the disk firmware updates, follow the instructions below.

trans-unit.source: Place the device in the Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: Place the device in the Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: Note that you should not use Windows PowerShell remoting when connecting to a device in Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: Note that you should not use Windows PowerShell remoting when connecting to a device in Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: Instead run this cmdlet on the device controller when connected through the device serial console.
trans-unit.target: Instead run this cmdlet on the device controller when connected through the device serial console.

trans-unit.source: Type:
trans-unit.target: Type:

trans-unit.source: A sample output is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample output is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Both the controllers then restart into Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: Both the controllers then restart into Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: To install the disk firmware update, type:
trans-unit.target: To install the disk firmware update, type:

trans-unit.source: A sample output is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample output is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Monitor the install progress using `Get-HcsUpdateStatus` command.
trans-unit.target: Monitor the install progress using `Get-HcsUpdateStatus` command.

trans-unit.source: The update is complete when the `RunInProgress` changes to `False`.
trans-unit.target: The update is complete when the `RunInProgress` changes to `False`.

trans-unit.source: After the installation is complete, the controller on which the maintenance mode hotfix was installed restarts.
trans-unit.target: After the installation is complete, the controller on which the maintenance mode hotfix was installed restarts.

trans-unit.source: Log in as option 1 with full access and verify the disk firmware version.
trans-unit.target: Log in as option 1 with full access and verify the disk firmware version.

trans-unit.source: Type:
trans-unit.target: Type:

trans-unit.source: The expected disk firmware versions are:
trans-unit.target: The expected disk firmware versions are:

trans-unit.source: A sample output is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample output is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Run the `Get-HcsFirmwareVersion` command on the second controller to verify that the software version has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Run the `Get-HcsFirmwareVersion` command on the second controller to verify that the software version has been updated.

trans-unit.source: You can then exit the maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: You can then exit the maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: To do so, type the following command for each device controller:
trans-unit.target: To do so, type the following command for each device controller:

trans-unit.source: The controllers restart when you exit Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: The controllers restart when you exit Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: After the disk firmware updates are successfully applied and the device has exited maintenance mode, return to the Azure classic portal.
trans-unit.target: After the disk firmware updates are successfully applied and the device has exited maintenance mode, return to the Azure classic portal.

trans-unit.source: Note that the portal might not show that you installed the Maintenance mode updates for 24 hours.
trans-unit.target: Note that the portal might not show that you installed the Maintenance mode updates for 24 hours.
